Module com.vnd.mco2restructure
Package com.vnd.mco2restructure.controller

Class StockManagerController

java.lang.Object
com.vnd.mco2restructure.controller.StockManagerController
public class StockManagerController extends Object
The StockManagerController class manages the stock of items in the vending machine. It handles updating the view, setting item enums, and navigating to the stock edit view.

    void
    addStocks()
    Adds stocks to the vending machine and navigates back to the main features view.

    Navigates to the stock edit view for the specified item and stock edit info.

    Resets the item enums in the stocks list based on the current vending machine's slots.

      Sets the ItemEnum and StockEditInfo for the given index in the stocks list.
      Parameters:
      itemEnum - The ItemEnum to set.
      index - The index in the stocks list.
      hasItemAlready - checks if the slot has an item already

      Navigates to the stock edit view for the specified item and stock edit info.
      Parameters:
      currentItem - The current item to edit.
      stockEditInfo - The stock edit info for the item.
